attributes.action: investigate why Microsoft Windows software is being used in mission-critical defence applications, namely on warships and submarines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Type 45 destroyers will allegedly be using Windows 2000 software, as well as submarines. I just cannot believe that this unreliable OS will be used in a defence capability. Truly worrying - please sign the petition if you're as concerned as I am.

Regards

John Goodwin
